moves.1. e4: Playing in a tournament so trying to be careful.  Opponent went for a Sicilian Dragon so I pulled the Yugoslav O-O-O.  Fun tactics at the end of the game.  At the time of this game I was already on a 5 game winning streak.
moves.1... c5 2. Nf3 Nc6 3. d4 cxd4 4. Nxd4 Nf: Now I feel like I gotta rush my K-side attack before he moves his Q-side pawns
moves.15. Bxg7 Kxg7 16. exd5 exd5 17. Ne2: I was thinking 17.Qf4 or one of the N's
moves.17... Re8 18. Nf4 Rc8 19. h5 Qc7 20. h6+: Usually doesn't work when I think up these crazy manoeuvers but here goes 24.Nh3-f2-g4-f6.  The problem is I lose initiative.
moves.24... Rce8 25. Nf2 Qe5 26. Ng4 Qb8 27. a: 28.Qf4 can't seem to make in-roads so I unintentionally faked him out!! lol  I'm pretty safe except for my d4 N en prise so wait for him to make a mistake like the one to come.  30...Qc5? the d7 N is the only defender of his Q so.... 31.Nf6+!
moves.28... Bb7 29. Qd2 Bc8 30. Qc3 Qc5 31. Nf: I didn't have a knockout plan but I wore him down and he resigned being 7 points down in the piece count.
